          <title>
            <string language="de">Karikatur zur Entnazifizierung</string>
            <string language="en">Caricature on Denazification</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caricature sur la Dénazification</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caricature em Denazification</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricature su Denazification</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καρικατούρα στην εκδίωξη του ναζισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caricature en Denazification</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Interpretation einer Karikatur von Stury zur Entnazifizierung 1948. Diese war auf dem Titelblatt der Zeitschrift "Das Wespennest" vom 7. Oktober 1948 veröffentlicht.</string>
            <string language="en">Interpretation of a caricature by Stury to the denazification in 1948 published on the front page of the magazine "Das Wespennest (The Wasp nest)" on October 7, 1948</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Entnazifizierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Krieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Deutschland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Entnazifizierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">War</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Post-war period</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Caricature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Germany</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La traduction d'une caricature par Stury à la 
dénazification dans 1948 a édité sur la page plan du magazine "Das 
Wespennest (l'emboîtement de guêpe)" 7 octobre 1948</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A interpretação de um caricature por Stury ao 
denazification em 1948 publicou na página dianteira do compartimento 
"Das Wespennest (o ninho da vespa)" outubro em 7, 1948</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'interpretazione di un caricature da Stury al 
denazification in 1948 ha pubblicato alla pagina anteriore dello 
scomparto "Das Wespennest (il nido della vespa)" il 7 ottobre 1948</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ερμηνεία μιας καρικατούρας από Stury στην εκδίωξη
του ναζισμού το 1948 δημοσίευσε πρώτη σελίδα του περιοδικού 
"DAS Wespennest (η φωλιά σφηκών)" στις 7 Οκτωβρίου ..1948</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La interpretación de un caricature de Stury al 
denazification en 1948 publicó en la paginación delantera del 
compartimiento "Das Wespennest (la jerarquía de la avispa)" de 
octubre el 7 de 1948</string>
          </description>
